Plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.
Title: Best in Show
Actors: Jay Brazeau, Parker Posey, Michael Hitchcock, Catherine O'Hara
tomatoConsensus: A fine example of writer-director-star Christopher Guest's gift for improv comedy, Best in Show boasts an appealingly quirky premise and a brilliantly talented cast.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 13 nominations.
